forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning, then variable clouds this afternoon with more showers possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...thunderstorms likely during the morning, with occasional showers this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 11C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with increasing winds and cloudy skies later in the day. High 51F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
